QuestData.Title: Contending With Bullies
QuestData.Description: We honor strength here, not brutality. It is unfortunate but there are some who come to my doorstep oblivious to this distinction.$b$BI have turned away one such challenger. In retaliation, he sacked the village of Yinying.$b$bGo to Yinying Village southeast of the temple, and face this "Shonuf." Give him a lesson in true strength.
